title: Yasuzo Masumura - Kyojin to gangu aka Giants and toys (1958)
description:
Yasuzo Masumura - Kyojin to gangu aka Giants and toys (1958)
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0051834/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0051834/</a>

Yasuzo Masumura&#039;s dark satire of postwar Japan&#039;s cutthroat business culture stars Hiroshi Kawaguchi as Nishi, a young executive for a candy company locked in fierce competition with two rival companies. By chance he and another executive in his company meet a loudmouthed female taxi driver with bad teeth, Kyoko (Hitomi Nozoe), who they transform, through a clever marketing campaign, into an unlikely sex symbol to launch their new line of caramels. Nishi also tries to extract information about his competitors&#039; marketing plans through an old college friend at one company and a girlfriend at another. Along the way he finds himself falling for Kyoko, but finds that the worlds of business and love are painfully incompatible.
